snippet.title: The Mortuary Assistant - Official Physical Edition Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Check out the Physical Edition Trailer for The Mortuary Assistant, a horror adventure simulation that puts the players in the shoes of a Mortuary Assistant. Embalm corpses, banish demons, save their souls along the way. The Mortuary Assistant is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, and PC with a physical version releasing on October 31.

#TheMortuaryAssistant #Gaming #PhysicalEdition
